nodes.text: Chokie was a popular food product sold in a box on the planet Tatooine. It was prepared as fresh dried chokie by being harvested while fresh, then set out to dry in the Dune Sea for three days. The food vendor Grendle sold these at a stand near the Mos Espa Grand Arena. Chokie was also exported to Coruscant, where it was sold by a Roonan at CorusMall near the Senate Building.
